snippet.title: Shantae and the Seven Sirens - Launch Trailer
snippet.description: Shantae and the Seven Sirens is now available on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PC, and Apple Arcade! Join the hair-whipping, hip-shaking, Half-Genie heroine on her biggest adventure yet, where she’ll fight, explore, dance, transform, collect, fuse, and power-up as she attempts to rescue her new Half-Genie allies and overcome the mysterious Seven Sirens! Featuring an incredible animated opening by the acclaimed Studio TRIGGER! Find out more at wayforward.com/shantaesevensirens!
